com.oracle.coherence.ai.DistanceAlgorithm

Packages that use DistanceAlgorithm
Package
Description
com.oracle.coherence.ai.distance
Contains classes for Coherence AI vector database distance algorithms.
com.oracle.coherence.ai.search
Contains classes for Coherence AI vector database Knn search functionality.

  • Uses of DistanceAlgorithm in com.oracle.coherence.ai.distance

    Classes in com.oracle.coherence.ai.distance that implement DistanceAlgorithm
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractDistance<T>
    A base class for distance algorithm implementations.
    class 
    CosineDistance<T>
    A DistanceAlgorithm that performs a cosine similarity calculation between two vectors.
    class 
    InnerProductDistance<T>
    A DistanceAlgorithm that performs inner product distance calculation between two vectors.
    class 
    L2SquaredDistance<T>
    A DistanceAlgorithm that performs an L2 squared distance calculation between two vectors.
